summary: A SWAT team leader is going undercover at a high school to retrieve a stolen gun for his captain.
cast: Stephen Chow|Man Cheung|Man-Tat Ng|Roy Cheung|Chi Yeung Wong|Gabriel Wong|Barry Wong|Dennis Chan|King-Tan Yuen|Sap-Yat Leung|Wai-Kit Tse|Kan-Wing Tsang|Bei-Dak Lai|Wallis Pang|Man-Ho Chan|Teddy Chan|Ridley Tsui|Wah Cheung|Yun-Kin Chow|Wai-Cheung Mak|Hsiang Lin Yin|Wong Kam Kwan|Christopher Chan Sai-Tang|Chuen Hau Lee|Douglas Kung|Siu-Ling Tsim|Pang-Fung Nip|Sam Kai-Sen Huang|Ying-Kin Woo|Chung-Ning Wong|Peter Kwok|Paul Chun|Nicholas Laletin|Roger Thomas
title: To hok wai lung
